title: Track the Learning & Development Budget
description: The L&D manager needs to check the department's training spend against the budget for the quarter.

tasks.description: Retrieve the L&D department's budget for the current fiscal year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager pulls up the approved budget.

tasks.description: Generate a report of all training-related expenditures for the quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager generates a spend report from the financial system.

tasks.description: Compare the actual spend to the prorated quarterly budget to determine if they are on track.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager calculates the variance and confirms they are currently under budget.
